name: Eremite Teatime
title: Eremite Teatime
desc: "Join the Eremites and Embrace a Wonderful New Life!"

skills.desc: If you have multiple characters of the same Elemental Type, then choose 1 Location card from 3 to add to your Hand; If you have multiple characters that use the same type of weapon, then choose 1 Item card from 3 to add to your Hand; If you have characters that belong to the same faction, then choose 1 Food card from 3 to add to your Hand.
